ISSUE.TITLE: Add a setting to enable/disable the specification filters
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: We have specification attributes and allow filtering by them. Demo - https://demo.nopcommerce.com/notebooks It can be helpful for store owners or third-party plugins who want to disable specification attributes in the entire store. Let's add a setting that will disable the specification filters on catalog pages (no matter whether specification attributes are configured with "allow filtering" or not). Add this setting to admin area > configuration > settings > catalog settings > "Catalog pages" block > "Enable specification attribute filtering". By default, the filters should be enabled. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/90152/nopcommerce-440-bug-fixes-and-improvements/page/9#283221
